title: Courses in London
content:
Hey all,

I have been messing about with Type since uni but would like to start getting a bit more serious about it. I know I could probably learn what I need by doing my own research but Id really like to take a class as my company is willing to pay for it ;) St Martins seems to have a course but I missed it.

[http://courses.csm.arts.ac.uk/shortcourse.asp?ct=1&ma=3&cat=17&ci=5729](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023161830/http:/courses.csm.arts.ac.uk/shortcourse.asp?ct=1&ma=3&cat=17&ci=5729 "http://courses.csm.arts.ac.uk/shortcourse.asp?ct=1&ma=3&cat=17&ci=5729")

Can any of you suggest another good course in London?
author: andehlu
